page.title: 08ST. MARY'S CHURCH
page.content: THE RECTOR OF ST.MARY'S PARISH CHURCH IN CHEDZOY IS THE REV. ROGER FRY,WHO IS ALSO VICAR OF WESTONZOYLAND.THERE ARE TWO CHURCHWARDENS,MR G.COULSON, VICAR'S WARDEN,AND MR M.STARR,PEOPLES WARDEN.THEY ACT AS A GO-BETWEEN BETWEEN THE RECTOR AND PARISHIONERS. OTHER OFFICERS ARE THE SIDESMEN,WHO TAKE THE COLLECTION AND SHOW THE CONGREGATION TO THEIR SEATS,THE SECRETARY AND THE TREASURER.THE CHURCH AFFAIRS ARE ADMINISTERED BY THE PAROCHIAL CHURCH COUNCIL OF NINE MEMBERS.APPROXIMATELY 20 PEOPLE ATTEND CHURCH REGULARLY,16 OF THEM TAKE HOLY COMMUNION.THE COLLECTION GOES TO THE CHURCH MAINLY FOR STIPENDS,SOME FOR MISSIONARY WORK,SOME TO MAINTAIN THE CHURCH FABRIC.THE CHURCHYARD IS CARED FOR BY MR COLEMAN,WHO RECEIVES A STIPEND FROM THE PARISH COUNCIL.A CHURCH ARCHITECT CARES FOR THE FABRIC.
